website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a shorter hose with a 1/4" diameter, this is a decent, affordable option.
pros: This is a straightforward hose from a trusted brand that works well
Rated for 3,000 PSI, this hose works with most gas pressure washers
cons: Not as durable as comparable hoses
The protective coating is likely to wear away, which can result in leaks

customer_reviews.title: Fittings are 22 mm / 14 mm Nipple - Fits Most Consumer Pressure Washers
customer_reviews.text: Good quality so far, including double O-rings on fittings on each end of the hose, and good connection finishes. Everyone keeps calling these hoses either 1/4" or 5/8". Both are incorrect. The hose itself is 12 mm outside diameter (i.e. slightly larger than 7/16"). But the fitting size is what's important - and on this hose the outer screw-on part of the fitting is 22 mm, and the inner "nipple" is 14 mm outside diameter. This is exactly what you want for most consumer pressure washers. For example, this fits my Briggs and Stratton Elite Series 675 (2.3 gpm, 2550 psi) pressure washer the same as the original hose.
customer_reviews.author: T. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Not a great hose, hope it lasts a little while
customer_reviews.text: Feels stiff, compared to OE. Not great for a pressure hose, since it is more likely to “lift up” and contact the exhaust on my pressure washer. I zip-tied the lower end of the hose to the pressure washer to decrease the chance of the exhaust melting the hose (again), but since it is so stiff, the hose doesn’t “relax” in a predictable way, and even just a few rotations of the hose can cause it to “float up” in the air in large ringlets.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Right size, seems durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hose because the pressure washer I bought had a weird size for the connection to the pressure washer gun. I had to purchase a new gun, and could not find an adapter that would fit, so instead, I decided to buy a new hose. I haven't gotten a chance to use it yet, but it feels high quality. It hooked up very easily to both the pressure washer and the new gun purchased. Can't wait to use it with my new foam cannon.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: defective product
customer_reviews.text: after 20 to 30 minutes of lite use, the black outer coating rubbed off on several spots (like 30) ....rubbing against wood deck, patio cement etc...not being stretched or twisted or pulled tightly .... then one of the spots burst and it was game over. I have owned a B&S power washer for 8 years and my last hose finally gave out, so I bought another B&S hose and was just disappointed, the new hose looked worse than my old 8 year old hose. Thanks to Amazon for the refund and great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D. Arnould

customer_reviews.title: Lubricate the connections
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind, this hose is only 25 feet. The connectors are good quality but I would strongly recommend lubricating them for ease of removal. Speaking of removal, do yourself a favor and disconnect BOTH ends, when you finish your project. I find that is the biggest mistake. Never leave the hose connected to the handle or the washer!!! This hose will work for any home DIY'er.
customer_reviews.author: KeithnGina

customer_reviews.title: Product terrible - vendor even worse
customer_reviews.text: Used the product for approximately 90 minutes when I noticed the coating protecting the inner hose had rubbed off to the point of exposing the inner hose. I was afraid it was going to blow so I stopped using it immediately. Contacted Wood Sales 4 times with no response, finally got a hold of them and sent pictures of defective product. They accused me of misuse. I used this product on grass the hose never touch any hard surfaces. Horrible product and even worse customer service.
customer_reviews.author: darci

customer_reviews.title: Adequate but stiff
customer_reviews.text: This hose fit and does what is expected of it. My main complaint is how stiff the hose is. It needs to lay in the sun awhile to be pliable enough to use easily, otherwise it is a bit of a hassle. I'm satisfied with the product and seller but might consider other options if the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: T Rob

customer_reviews.title: Does not last at all!
customer_reviews.text: Used it once, and per reviews before me, I was very careful to not have hose near hot engine, but yet after about 1 hour it developed a hole and unusable even with tape. Was skeptical about even purchasing this one, but knew it would fit my pressure washer, thought I'd just be careful, and purchased it anyway. Not sure how this product can still be even made with a flaw so vital to its operation.
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Outside coating not up to original standards
customer_reviews.text: The original hose got to close to the engine and melted the outside coating. So I thought I would take time to re-rout this new hose and avoid contacting the engine. Turns out that after two hours of use, every place the hose came in contact with something harder, the plastic coating wore away. In two hours the new hose looked worse than the five year old original, even though the exterior initially looked identical . Needless to say Amazon got it back.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Close to the original
customer_reviews.text: No problems attaching to my high pressure sprayer. The hose is a bit less pliable than the original but works well. Hose is black versus red color of the original. Perhaps a different material.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: Replacement hose for my Brute 2500 psi pressure washer. Perfect fit good price and seems to work well. Really can't attest to durability as I just put it on but appears well made.
customer_reviews.author: Hubert H Brown

customer_reviews.title: Hosed by a Hose!
customer_reviews.text: Hose quality not up to Briggs and Stratton standards. Very thin outer covering abrades quickly, inner hose construction lacks substantial pressure braiding for longevity. I bought this name brand hose because Briggs and Stratton used to stand for quality. It doesn't any longer!
customer_reviews.author: Scott F. Koehler

customer_reviews.title: No Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I have rental properties and when a renter moves out, power washing the house, fences, sidewalks and drive ways really improves the eye appeal, so I use mine a lot. Power washers almost always leak around the connections, but not this one. This is only my second hose after years of use, and they never leak. It is made with quality connectors that are easy to get on and off and the hose does not kink. I am very satisfied with this product and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert LaRey

customer_reviews.title: Good Hose
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy this replacement hose because the replacement gun I bought wasn't compatible to the old one (this is a Briggs problem). This hose is much better than the original. It's not as stiff and easier to unroll and roll up than the original.
customer_reviews.author: Jasan Fujii

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Stiff But Works Well...
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than the hose that came with our pressure washer, which stopped working after its third use. This hose is a bit stiffer than the previous one but does seem sturdier and better quality/more heavy duty. Hopefully, it'll last longer than the initial hose did. So far, we've used it twice without any problems and it's going strong.
customer_reviews.author: SomeGeekyGirlTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my worn out original hose. Have used 3 years now and no problems. Bought another to extend for better reach I liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Gardens Guy

customer_reviews.title: THE HOSE DID NOT LAST LONG
customer_reviews.text: THE HOSE IS CHEAP MADE AND USED MY PESSURE WASHER FOR 20 MINS AND THE LINE BLOWN OUT SO I HAD TO GO BUY A DIFF ONE TO FINSH THE JOB I WAS DOING
customer_reviews.author: Mac F.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a replacement hose for my pressure washer. Easy to install, way cheaper than at local hardware & big box stores. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bojangles

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: We were borrowing the neighbors pressure washer when the water hose line burst. Did some research for compatibility and this one looked to work. We finished the fence, driveway and a few other projects before returning the pressure washer. The new house worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement hose
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace the hose on a Craftsman pressure washer that had gotten against the motor and burned in half. Used this one today with no problems at all. Fit perfectly and worked as it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Shalakoh

customer_reviews.title: Quality hose for the money and lot better bargain than Walmart's choices.
customer_reviews.text: After my original equipment hose starting wearing thru in spots, I decided it was time to break down and get a replacement. Since I go to Walmart at least 3 times a week, I checked the price there first. This is a much better bargain than the choices at Walmart. This is a quality hose at a better price and no tax for me in Missouri. Don't wait till your current hose springs a leak. Since buying this, I have used my pressure washer to clean my deck to restain it, and clean the cement underneath it. This hose is as good or better than the OEM hose.
customer_reviews.author: chiefy3

customer_reviews.title: Hoping this last longer then 1 season
customer_reviews.text: Ive been replacing these hoses every season. Same brand, but for the price its fine. I use my pressure washer only a handful of times a year and this will make the 3rd replacement in 4 years. Yes it supercedes the pressure ratings for my washer so theoretically it should be reliable, but unfortunately that has not been the case. So why not spend money on a more expensive hose? For what I use it for I'll take my chances and play the odds.
customer_reviews.author: MakeMeBuyIt

customer_reviews.title: Works like original
customer_reviews.text: Works well, this is second one I ordered. I unfortunately dragged last one across concrete and created hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Exact fit
customer_reviews.text: Was the exact replacement fir for my power washer. I immediately used it and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Hose
customer_reviews.text: Had to purchase to replace a hose that was burnt, this was exactly like the original.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Earthlink

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, great replacement/backup hose
customer_reviews.text: After using my power washer for the first time I powered it down and turned off the water supply. I then attempted (with brute force, pliers, foul language, etc.) to detach the original hose. I succeeded in badly mangling the ends of the hose only to find out that you have to release the pressure in the hose (with the wand trigger) for the hose to detach. Needless to say I needed a new hose and this one works perfectly. If it isn't OEM, it should be listed as such. Great replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Morabito

customer_reviews.title: Works well with our B&S power washer.
customer_reviews.text: Our old hose wore out and I didn't want to take a chance with a generic hose not fitting. Works great. Only used it for a total of a week but so far no problems at all.

customer_reviews.text: This is the replacement hose to buy as it is identical to the more expensive one that is marketed.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Washer Hose, definitely consider!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the original hose on a Power Stroke power washer. The washer itself is fantastic. Has a nice Honda engine that works great. The original hose was OK, but not the best quality. Amazon had the best selection so I went with the Briggs & Stratton 1/4-Inch X 25' Pressure Washer Hose. Not disappointed at all. Quality hose with double o rings in the connectors. Great hose, great price,great service! Easy connection, were off and washing!!

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price.
customer_reviews.text: Just don’t let it touch the muffler! Made that mistake twice!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement.
customer_reviews.text: It fits like a glove. Easy to instal in no time. And the price was unbeatable.

customer_reviews.title: ... pictures and glowing reviews this would be a little better quality than the OEM hose
customer_reviews.text: I thought from the pictures and glowing reviews this would be a little better quality than the OEM hose, or at least be a rubber hose and not that kinky vinyl. No such luck, this wasn't an upgrade at all. No matter which way you roll it there are multiple kinks whenever the hose is extended. And the wonderful vinyl is quick to melt whenever it grazes the exhaust. Fail.

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.text: This hose was damage when arrived , plastic coating (Black) ripped to the point the metal or wiring is visible. Please send replacement however received item was used on a pending job. Had no other choice.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for 4 1/2 years

I wasn't sure if this one was going to work because my previous one had a quick-disconnect on it. After receiving this, I was able to simply unscrew the connection that came stock on my washer and simply screw this one on in it's place! Perfect replacement!

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality

Arrived quickly and happy as the quality is more flexible than the one it came with the original washer. Very pleased indeed with this purchase

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Bought to replace the original one that ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought to replace the original one that came with the pressure washer and it works just as well.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and exactly OEM quality
customer_reviews.text: The best part of this purchase was the seller giving a highly competitive price - better than Sears by about 20% - and it arrived swiftly. I was looking for an even better quality hose that wouldn't wear out when scrubbed across the ground, but couldn't find one. At this price, I am happy to just replace it with the same Briggs and Stratton make.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement hose.
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement hose for my pressure washer. I haven't found that it has been more "flexible" than my old pressure washer hose but it gets the job done.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic replacement
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement hose. I burned mine in the exhaust of the pressure washer and couldn't repair it. went to Lowes, who sold me the unit to begin with and they didn't have a replacement hose. Feels just as well built as the original. maybe because it's OEM, i'm not sure. Either way, would definitely buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A handy replacement for the hose I burned a hole in by getting too close to the exhaust.

customer_reviews.title: I shop Amazon first.
customer_reviews.text: It saves me time and money of which I do not have an abundance of either one. This item is the exact replacement. With the cost of fuel these days and Amazons wide selection, online shopping just makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: The hose that came with my pressure washer made it about 5 years before it had a blow out. This one replaced it and works just fine. The connections seem like they are easier to get back off the fittings at the end of the day, and the price was right. Home Depot wanted almost $80 for a new hose, so this is a bargain at less than 1/3 the price.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Weston

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised at half the price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to replace a worn hose on my Briggs & Stratton pressure washer. Newer design than the hose that was on my pressure washer, this one has two o-rings, which is a very good idea because the single o-ring design I had kept blowing out the o-rings. I looked online at local hardware stores and large home stores and this was half the price too! And with Prime, I got it delivered to my door in two days. Can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley C.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered, I ordered original B & ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I ordered, I ordered original B & S pressure hose but received an after market hose that looked to be of less quality & to avoid the hassle I excepted in hopes I can modify for my use, would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: turfer46

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Replacement..  Simple
customer_reviews.text: Way better quality compared to the pressure hose that came with the power washer. Does not kink like a cheap garden hose. I would advise detaching it. Thicker which allow for more power. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Arnstein

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Troybuilt 2700
customer_reviews.text: My husband didn't head my warnings about watching the hose around the engine portion of the pressure washer, and burnt a hole in the very first time he used it. I wasn't about to pay $40-50 for a new one, so I compared many of the hoses on amazon and finally settled on this one sense Briggs & Stratton also make Troybuilt. I was a little worried about it not fitting, but it works perfectly. I would say for the value, it was a very good choice. It has held up well and as long as my darling husband doesn't burn this one, we should be just fine :)
customer_reviews.author: Queen Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A direct replacement for damaged Troy Built 2800 psi Pressure Washer Hose
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item as a direct replacement for damaged Troy Built 2800 psi Pressure Washer Hose. Arrived quickly and just as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Direct Replacement
customer_reviews.text: This was a direct replacement for the factory hose. I learned the hard way that you must pay attention to where the hose is in relation to the power washer. The muffler burned a hole through the original hose. A costly but important lesson to learn.
customer_reviews.author: GregJ

customer_reviews.title: It fits and it works
customer_reviews.text: It fits and it works. I didn't pay much and I don't expect much in return. I've used these in the past and they are good for a few years and then need to be replaced. Money will get you a much better quality item but only if you care for such things. I'd rather replace it every so often.
customer_reviews.author: DRT

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The outside plastic wore thru to the cloth after one use.

customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Had accidentally melted the original hose and went back to Lowes to get a replacement, and they only carried a generic version that didn't even fit correctly. Researched on amazon and found the exact hose. Quick delivery and arrived in perfect condition.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this hose!
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for a busted hose on my pressure washer! Price was cheaper than even much lower quality hoses sold locally. Very happy!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Exact replacement for my Craftsman pressure washer hose. Works great.

customer_reviews.text: The replacement hose arrived ahead of the scheduled date in perfect condition. I couldn't have asked for more. Great deal!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased! Hand tightens...no tools needed. Better fit then the original.

customer_reviews.title: Power Washer Hose
customer_reviews.text: The Briggs and Stratton Part Number 196006GS Hose developed a pin hole leak in the hose the second time I used it. It is no longer functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace the hose on my older Pressure Washer. I got a standard unit from Costco using the Honda Engine but after a couple of years of use we managed to cut the hose on the side of the pressure washer. This was a simple, cost effective replacement that was delivered in just two days.

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: The hose fits well and looks good but is too soft for this much pressure .I used this new one about three times and it already has a bubble coming out of the sheath.You have to be careful not to let it kink and don't step on it.I say any hose with a pressure rating this high should have braided wire in it. So now I'm going to purchase a better quality hose.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my original hose after it met up w/ the exhaust on my pressure washer. Needless to say, this is an exact OEM replacement hose and shouldn't give you any issues as far as fitment goes (as long as you read your owner's manual and cross reference your part numbers) and it seems to be working as it should.

customer_reviews.text: I have a 2550 psi power washer and inadvertently melted the hose on the hot engine surface. The manufacturer wanted $50 for a replacement hose. This hose was less than $20, shipped to my door. It looks and fits identical to the original hose. Amazon rocks!
customer_reviews.author: IT guy in Lakeside

customer_reviews.title: Product Failed After Minimal Use
customer_reviews.text: After very light use 1-2 times per year for 3 years, the hose ruptured.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Jeff

customer_reviews.title: works very well
customer_reviews.text: My original hose was burned because it touched the engine while it was hot. When I bought this hose , I was worried about the connections. No problems, it fits perfectly,and it works as good as the original hose that came with the machine. The price is good too. There is nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: nariman

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a replacement hose.
customer_reviews.text: After my 50' hose died, I bought this 25' hose. It's a bit of a hassle using a shorter hose, but the price point is excellent. I could buy another hose and connect them with a $10 adapter, but I've become accustomed to the 25' hose.
customer_reviews.author: AMLENTZ

customer_reviews.title: Great company, great products!
customer_reviews.text: Great hose, and EXCELLENT customer service! I highly recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Oman

customer_reviews.title: Better quality pressure washer hose
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a better quality hose, more flexible and easier to roll up than the original hose!
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: ... mine at muffler got this on on 2 days great price and
customer_reviews.text: burnt mine at muffler got this on on 2 days great price and product
customer_reviews.author: Gerald B. Dorn

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The hose I had melted on the engine (my fault). This is a great replacement and says keep away from heat about 100 times the entire length of the hose. I just finished power washing my driveway and the hose worked flawlessly. What more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Tom A.

customer_reviews.title: Oem replacement hose. Durable and the same as original ...
customer_reviews.text: Oem replacement hose. Durable and the same as original, works as it should. Not much more you can say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike
